```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
degs <- read.delim("data/degs_rnaseq.tsv")


data <- degs %>% 
  mutate(celltype = if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "Lgr5"), "Lgr5", "Organoids")) %>%
  mutate(cond1    = if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "- APC "), "APC", 
                            if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "- bCAT "), "bCAT", 
                                    if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "- WTp "), "WTp", 
                                            if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "- WTn "), "WTn", 
                                                    if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "- WT "), "WT", "NA")))))) %>%
  mutate(cond2    = if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "vs APC"), "APC", 
                            if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "vs bCAT"), "bCAT", 
                                    if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "vs WTp"), "WTp", 
                                            if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "vs WTn"), "WTn", 
                                                    if_else(str_detect(string = degs$Contrast, pattern = "vs WT"), "WT", "NA")))))) 
         
write.table(x = data, file = "../data/degs_rnaseq_new.tsv", quote = F, sep = "\t", row.names = F, col.names = T)
```
